title: Lay U Down
lyrics:
Tell me if you've been
Feeling lonely
When I’m not around
You need some conversation
When you're feeling down
Then I'll be there

To hold you near

And give you what you need

And you know it’s true



Girl I'll be touching you

All over your body

I'll break the law

Can't stop it ain't enough

No need to worry bout what I do

I'll be gentle yes it's true

Girl I will love you

Till the morning



Just tell me what you want

And I'll give it all to you

I love the feeling

That you’re giving to me

When it feels so right

It can never be wrong

Don’t be afraid

Just give in to me



Girl I I wanna lay you down

I wanna lay you down

Girl I I just wanna lay you down

Lay you down

Lay you down



Baby I know that you been looking

For me late at night

And you want me to come over

‘cause it feels so right

I know what you want

So let's have fun

It’s all right and you know

It's true



Girl I'll be touching you

All over your body

I'll break the law

Can’t stop it ain't enough

No need to worry bout what I do

I'll be gentle yes it's true

Girl I will love you

Till the morning



Just tell me what you want

And I'll give it all to you

I love the feeling

That you're giving to me

When it feels so right

It can never be wrong

Don't be afraid

Just give in to me



Girl I I wanna lay you down

I wanna lay you down

Girl I I just wanna lay you down

Lay you down

Lay you down



Three two one girl



Girl I'll be touching you

Feeling you

All over your body

Touching you feeling you

All over your body

Loving you all the time

So let's get it started

Let's get it started tonight



Girl I I wanna lay you down

I wanna lay you down

Girl I I just wanna lay you down

Lay you down

Lay you down



Girl I I wanna lay you down

I wanna lay you down

Girl I I just wanna lay you down

Lay you down

Lay you down
